content: कृत्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [कृत-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Skin, hide (in general); <ls>Mu. 3. 20.</ls> {@--2@} Especially, the hide of an antelope on which a religious student sits. {@--3@} The bark of the birch-tree used for writing upon &c. {@--4@} The birch-tree. {@--5@} One of the lunar mansions, Pleiades. {@--6@} A house.
